name_zh: 耶稣门徒生命自评量表

groups.name_zh: 五个与“生命状态”有关的行为
五个与“行为行动”有关的行为

sections.title_en: Identity: Grounded in God's grace and forgiveness
sections.title_zh: 身份：扎根在神的恩典与赦免中

items.text_en: In the deepest place of my life, I feel God's love and acceptance.
items.text_zh: 在我生命最深处，我真实感受到神的爱与接纳。

items.text_en: I trust God without pretense and often share everything about myself with God.
items.text_zh: 我在神面前没有伪装，常常向祂倾吐自己的一切。

items.text_en: I often feel secure in the Lord and embrace Him as Father.
items.text_zh: 我常常在主里感到安稳，并以祂为我的天父。

items.text_en: I am precious and significant in God's eyes because of His unconditional love and forgiveness.
items.text_zh: 因着神无条件的爱与赦免，我知道自己在祂眼中宝贵又重要。

items.text_en: I often experience God's love and healing of any crippling hurts, habits, or hungering.
items.text_zh: 我常经历神的爱与医治，修复我内在的伤痛、捆绑和渴求。

sections.title_zh: 圣洁：培养基督样式的品格

items.text_en: I often repent and make reconciliation with God and people.
items.text_zh: 我常常在神面前悔改，并主动与人和好。

items.text_en: I consecrate myself daily by making deliberate choices to pursue a path that glorifies God.
items.text_zh: 我每天有意识地做选择，使自己分别为圣，行在荣耀神的道路上。

items.text_en: I purposefully cultivate and exhibit the fruit of the Holy Spirit.
items.text_zh: 我刻意培养并活出圣灵的果子。

items.text_en: By God's grace, I dedicate myself to rooting out the impurity of my life.
items.text_zh: 靠着神的恩典，我致力于除去生命中的各种不洁。

items.text_en: I often examine my behaviors and words lest I sin against God.
items.text_zh: 我常常省察自己的行为和言语，免得得罪神。

sections.title_en: Habit: Develop a rhythm for life to cultivate intimacy with Christ
sections.title_zh: 习惯：建立生命节奏，培养与基督的亲密关系

items.text_en: I practice a regular quiet time with God by prayer, reading Scriptures, meditation, etc.
items.text_zh: 我有规律地与神安静相处，通过祷告、读经、默想等亲近祂。

items.text_en: I have developed particular practices that lead me to feel close to God.
items.text_zh: 我养成了一些属灵操练，使我更亲近神。

items.text_en: I often leave a margin in life so that God can work on me and renew my life.
items.text_zh: 我常在生活中预留空间，让神作工、更新我的生命。

items.text_en: I make plans for weekly, monthly, and annual sabbaths to "restore my soul."
items.text_zh: 我会规划每周、每月、每年的“安息时间”，使我的心灵得以恢复。

items.text_en: I live an unhurried lifestyle by saying "no" to many things that may hinder my time with God.
items.text_zh: 我学习过一种不匆忙的生活方式，对那些妨碍我与神相处的事说“不”。

sections.title_en: Posture: Holding a posture of faithfulness, humility, and surrender
sections.title_zh: 姿态：持守忠心、谦卑与顺服的姿态

items.text_en: I am consistent with what I believe about God's teaching and what I do.
items.text_zh: 我信仰中所认识的神的教导，与我实际的行为基本一致。

items.text_en: I usually can fulfill the ministry the Lord assigned me to accomplish.
items.text_zh: 我通常能完成主交托给我的服事。

items.text_en: I habitually put others first before myself.
items.text_zh: 我习惯把别人的需要放在自己之前。

items.text_en: I seek constructive criticism from fellow believers.
items.text_zh: 我愿意寻求并接纳弟兄姊妹给予我的建设性批评。

items.text_en: I learn to let go of my will and let God control.
items.text_zh: 我学习放下自己的意思，让神掌权。

sections.title_en: Calling: Pay attention to God's dynamic call
sections.title_zh: 呼召：留心神不断的呼召

items.text_en: I always have a sense of calling from the Lord.
items.text_zh: 我一直有从主而来的呼召感。

items.text_en: I am aware of my developmental stages and know where I am heading.
items.text_zh: 我留心自己生命成长的阶段，并大致知道自己要往哪里去。

items.text_en: I can see people, events, and circumstances from a sovereignty perspective.
items.text_zh: 我能从神主权的角度来看待人、事件和环境。

items.text_en: I habitually seek God's will for my life through searching and discerning effort.
items.text_zh: 我习惯藉着查考、分辨，持续寻求神在我生命中的旨意。

items.text_en: I am attentive to the voice of the Holy Spirit.
items.text_zh: 我留心圣灵的声音。

sections.title_en: Witness: Glorify God by sharing Good News and showing good deeds
sections.title_zh: 见证：藉着分享福音与善行荣耀神

items.text_en: I am prepared to share my testimony.
items.text_zh: 我预备好与人分享自己的见证。

items.text_en: I regularly pray for non-believers I know.
items.text_zh: 我经常为我认识的未信主的人祷告。

items.text_en: I live a life of "show and tell" (showing my good deeds and sharing the Good News).
items.text_zh: 我以生活见证与口传福音相结合，活出“让人看见也听见”的生命。

items.text_en: I intentionally make friends with my neighbors and fellow employees.
items.text_zh: 我有意识地与邻居和同事建立友谊。

items.text_en: I regularly invite people to "come and see" Jesus Christ through various church functions.
items.text_zh: 我常常邀请人参加教会各样聚会，使他们能“来看看”耶稣基督。

sections.title_en: Stewarding: Discovering gifts, capabilities, and passion
sections.title_zh: 管家职分：发现恩赐、能力与热情

items.text_en: I understand my spiritual gifts and use those gifts to serve others.
items.text_zh: 我明白自己的属灵恩赐，并用这些恩赐去服事别人。

items.text_en: I have a sound knowledge of my learned skills, natural abilities, and personality.
items.text_zh: 我对自己所学的技能、天赋能力和性格有清楚的认识。

items.text_en: I know my passions for serving in the local church or other spheres of life.
items.text_zh: 我知道自己在当地教会或其他生活领域中服事的热情所在。

items.text_en: I am good at managing my time, finances, and talents for Christ's kingdom.
items.text_zh: 我善于管理自己的时间、金钱和才能，为基督的国度使用。

items.text_en: I regularly contribute time to church ministries with my gifts.
items.text_zh: 我经常用自己的恩赐和时间参与教会事工。

sections.title_en: Role: Knowing your unique contribution and role
sections.title_zh: 角色：认识自己独特的贡献与角色

items.text_en: I am eager to seek responsibilities in the Christian faith community.
items.text_zh: 我乐意在基督信仰群体中承担责任。

items.text_en: I know God has sharpened my personality and temperament in a particular way for His purpose.
items.text_zh: 我知道神以特别的方式塑造了我的个性和气质，为成就祂的旨意。

items.text_en: I know my unique contribution and effective methods to serve in Christ's kingdom.
items.text_zh: 我了解自己独特的贡献，以及如何有效地在基督的国度中服事。

items.text_en: I spend time praying for taking leadership roles to make greater contribution.
items.text_zh: 我花时间祷告，预备自己承担领导的角色，以作更大的贡献。

items.text_en: I am willing to take risks instead of staying in complacency regarding my leadership role.
items.text_zh: 在带领的角色上，我愿意为主冒险，而不是停留在安逸中。

sections.title_en: Community: Developing authenticity and vulnerability in faith community
sections.title_zh: 群体：在信仰群体中建立真实与敞开的关系

items.text_en: I have a deep sense of belonging in the Christian faith community.
items.text_zh: 我在基督信仰群体中有深深的归属感。

items.text_en: I allow other Christians to hold me accountable for spiritual growth.
items.text_zh: 我愿意让其他基督徒在属灵成长上监督、提醒我。

items.text_en: I am intentionally engaged in building Christian community.
items.text_zh: 我有意识地投入在建立基督徒团契和社区中。

items.text_en: I have Christian friends to deeply share with each other toward personal growth and maturity.
items.text_zh: 我与基督徒朋友彼此深入分享，一同追求成长与成熟。

items.text_en: I often experience authenticity and vulnerability in the group I belong to.
items.text_zh: 我常在所属的小组或群体中经历真实与彼此敞开。

sections.title_en: Empowering: Helping others discover their potential for spiritual growth
sections.title_zh: 成全：帮助别人发现属灵成长的潜能

items.text_en: I help others discover their ministry gifts and become involved in ministry.
items.text_zh: 我帮助别人发现他们的服事恩赐，并鼓励他们参与事工。

items.text_en: I provide guidance to help others discover their potential for spiritual growth.
items.text_zh: 我提供引导，帮助别人发掘属灵成长的潜力。

items.text_en: I offer a biblical perspective when helping others work through struggles and questions.
items.text_zh: 当别人经历挣扎与问题时，我会从圣经的角度帮助他们思考。

items.text_en: I gain skills needed to effectively nurture others toward Christlikeness and wholeness.
items.text_zh: 我刻意学习与操练，使自己能更有效地培育别人，帮助他们更像基督、更完全。

items.text_en: I make disciples through teaching, mentoring, coaching, or other forms of relationship.
items.text_zh: 我藉着教导、陪伴、辅导等关系，带领人作主的门徒。
